methods: abstract CharSequence getTransformation(CharSequence source, View view) Returns a CharSequence that is a transformation of the source text -- for example, replacing each character with a dot in a password field.

abstract void onFocusChanged(View view, CharSequence sourceText, boolean focused, int direction, Rect previouslyFocusedRect) This method is called when the TextView that uses this TransformationMethod gains or loses focus.
